page.title: 13Playing in Sigglesthorne.
page.content: Children in Sigglesthorne play on the{school field}when the school is not in use. They play{football}there or ride their{B.M.X.'s}on the playground. A lot of children play in the {woods.}Some children call for their friends in{Seaton.}Some people ride their{horses}or{ponies. When it is raining some children ask their friends in to play inside. Some people listen to{records}or watch {television}on rainy days. Lots of people go to the{village {shop}for sweets and other things. Some children go{swimming}in{Beverley at the weekend. There is a Seaton and Sigglesthorne{Tennis Court}in Seaton and people from Sigglesthorne often go and play tennis. There is also a{football}pitch and a{youth club where you can dance and play{snooker.
